mapper.sql: id, order_unit_no, order_unit_code, organ_no, name, company_no, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark

if.if: AND (UPPER(t.order_unit_no) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(#{params.q},'%')) OR t.name LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{params.q},'%')))

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS S FROM (SELECT T1.* FROM ORDER_UNIT T1 WHERE 1 = 1 /*organ_type_no*/ ) T WHERE 1=1
mapper.delete: delete from order_unit where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} or order_unit_no = #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into order_unit (order_unit_no, order_unit_code, organ_no, name, company_no, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark) values ( #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update order_unit
order_unit_no = #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_unit_code = #{orderUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_no = #{organNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} or order_unit_no = #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}

update order_unit set order_unit_no = #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_unit_code = #{orderUnitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_no = #{organNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_no = #{companyNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} or order_unit_no = #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
